disp-quote.p: A315: “Recently it happened. He told me to go to Nalufenya and I refused and decided to go to another place because the people at *** hospital delay patients. My child will die from there. They toss you up and down before offering any treatment. In that way we did not agree. I went on my own and he did not give me money. When I got there I called him on phone and informed him of where I was and he came . ”
